sparqlUpdate

public void sparqlUpdate(java.lang.String query)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                         java.lang.Exception
Description copied from interface: API
Perform a SPARQL 1.1 Update query (e.g. INSERT, DELETE, UPDATE). If the query contains the special variable $usercontext$, it is replaced with an new user context. In such case also the meta context information are written.

Specified by:
sparqlUpdate in interface API
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
java.lang.Exception
